NO_INITIAL_SPACE: It cannot start with a space.
NO_TRAILING_SPACE: It cannot end with a space.
USERNAME: It can only have letters and numbers.
MAX_WORDS_BETWEEN: It must have between {{MIN}} and {{MAX}} words.
EIGHT_LONG: It must be at least 8 characters long.
ONE_NUMBER: It must contain at least one number.
ONE_SPECIAL: It must contain at least one special character.
OPS: Sorry, it seems like someone already chose that number. Please pick another.
ONE_UPPERCASE: It must contain at least one uppercase letter.
ONE_LOWERCASE: It must contain at least one lowercase letter.

LOGIN.PROVIDER: Choose how you want to sign in

ACTION.TITLE: Designing smarter is just a click away.
ACTION.DESCRIPTION: Start using GT Design now and see how much time and effort you can save!

BENEFITS.DESCRIPTION: A powerful tool for developers to streamline workflow, save time, and enhance design outcomes.

SAVE_TIME.TITLE: Save time
SAVE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: By automating repetitive tasks, you can free up more time to focus on the creative aspects of your work

IMPROVE_EFFICIENCY.TITLE: Improve efficiency
IMPROVE_EFFICIENCY.DESCRIPTION: Streamline workflow and reduce manual labor for faster, more accurate project completion without sacrificing quality.

ENHANCE_OUTCOMES.TITLE: Enhance outcomes
ENHANCE_OUTCOMES.DESCRIPTION: From phone masking to email validation, we ensure that your applications look and function exactly as intended.

SAVE_TIME.TITLE: Save time
SAVE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: With easy-to-use validation for emails, numbers, and more, you can ensure that your data is accurate and reliable.

GLOBAL_REACH.TITLE: Global Reach with i18n
GLOBAL_REACH.DESCRIPTION: It includes i18n by default, ensuring that your application is fully localized and ready to use in any language.

MASKING_BY_DEFAULT.TITLE: Masking by Default
MASKING_BY_DEFAULT.DESCRIPTION: With GT Design's powerful number masking tools, you can easily display phone numbers and other numerical data in the format that suits your needs.

EASY_TO_STYLE_THEME.TITLE: Easy-to-style theme
EASY_TO_STYLE_THEME.DESCRIPTION: You can customize the look and feel of your application to match your brand and user preferences.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Designed and built in sleepless nights by Gabriel Avila

EXAMPLE.EASY_AS_SHOULD: As easy as it should be.
